sentences.en: A lizard will regenerate its tail if it's cut off.
sentences.cn: 蜥蜴的尾巴如被切掉,它会重新生出一条尾巴.

sentences.en: Crystalline cells regenerate and do not age or become ill.
sentences.cn: 水晶细胞重生并不再老化或生病.

sentences.en: efforts to regenerate the US economy
Increased chances of regenerate quantity affixes on throwing items.
sentences.cn: 增加投掷物品的恢复机会.

sentences.en: Iron Will ( Level 8 ) - When severely injured, you regenerate health.
sentences.cn: 钢铁意志 ( 要求等级8级 ) 当受重伤时, 你可以回复生命.

sentences.en: Nerve cells have limited ability to regenerate if destroyed.
sentences.cn: 如果受到损伤，神经细胞再造的能力有限。

sentences.en: Roaches have a short ranged attack and can regenerate health quickly.
sentences.cn: 蟑螂是短距离攻击和耐力值再生快速的一种单位.

sentences.en: Small nodules form as the liver cells regenerate.
sentences.cn: 肝细胞再生时会形成一些小结节。

sentences.en: The Marshall Plan sought to regenerate the shattered Europe of 1947.
sentences.cn: 马歇尔计划试图重建1947年千疮百孔的欧洲。

sentences.en: The money will be used to regenerate the commercial heart of the town.
sentences.cn: 这笔钱将用来发展壮大市镇的商业中心。

sentences.en: Their aim is to regenerate British industry.
sentences.cn: 他们的目的是复兴英国的工业.

sentences.en: They decided a housing co-operative was the way to regenerate Ormiston Crescent.
sentences.cn: 他们最终决定通过住房合作社来重建奥米斯顿月牙街。

sentences.en: They do not regenerate through the control loop.
sentences.cn: 它们不能通过控制回路来恢复.

sentences.en: This creature's tail will regenerate if it is cut off.
sentences.cn: 这种动物的尾巴如果被割掉,会再生出来.

sentences.en: This creature's tail will regenerate if it's cut off.
sentences.cn: 这动物的尾巴割掉会再长的.

sentences.en: This kind of animal's tail will regenerate if it is cut off.
sentences.cn: 这种动物的尾巴如被切除会重新长出来.

sentences.en: Use: Regenerate 16 mana per 5 sec for 60 min. Guardian Elixir.
sentences.cn: 使用: 每5秒恢复16点法力值,持续60分钟. 守护药剂.

words.tran_cn: [生物][化学][物] 再生，重生；重建

trans.tran_en: to grow again, or make something grow again

trans.tran_cn: 新生， 再生， 起革新作用
trans.tran_en: to grow again, or make something grow again
to grow again, or make something grow again

trans.tran_cn: 回收（废热，废料等），使再生，革新，使悔悟
